property name: str

Name of the benchmark.

on_poll(handler)

Set handler for polling a result.

Parameters:

handler (Callable[[Token], Result | None]) – Function that checks if the execution of the task is completed. This function should return a Result instance if the task is completed, and None otherwise.

Return type:

None

on_run(handler)

Set handler for executing tasks with a method.

Parameters:

handler (Callable[[Task, Method], Result | Token]) – Function that executes a task with a method. The function should return a Result instance if the task can be completed at once. Otherwise, a Token instance is returned which can be used to obtain the result at a later time.

Return type:

None

poll(token)
Parameters:

token (Token)

Return type:

Result | None
